posts.post_title: Johnny Evers t3 Turkey Red Beckett graded 1 $140
posts.post_content:
Johnny Evers T3 turkey Red Beckett graded 1 $140. Dont mind the glare on the sides that is from the reflection of the camera. nice card for the price!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=4673&d=1250730920[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=4674&d=1250730933[/IMG]
I will take it. email me at [url]coe.biggers@gmail.com[/url] to where to send payment.  thanks Coe
